scripts.dev: npx -y concurrently -n "INFRA,SERVER,WORKER,CLIENT" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta" "docker-compose up" "cd server && .venv\Scripts\python -m uvicorn main:app --reload" "cd server && .venv\Scripts\python -m celery -A config.celery_app worker --loglevel=info --pool=eventlet" "cd client && npm run dev"
